title: Sharp bounds for the max-sliced Wasserstein distance
abstract: arXiv:2403.00666v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: We obtain sharp upper and lower bounds for the expected max-sliced 1-Wasserstein distance between a probability measure on a separable Hilbert space and its empirical distribution from $n$ samples. A version of this result for probability measures on Banach spaces is also obtained.

translated_title: 最大切片Wasserstein距离的尖锐界限
translated_abstract: 我们得到了关于在可分希尔伯特空间上的概率测度与从$n$个样本中获得的经验分布之间期望的最大切片1-Wasserstein距离的尖锐上下界。我们还得到了一个适用于Banach空间上的概率测度的版本。
tldr: 对于可分希尔伯特空间上的概率测度与其经验分布之间的最大切片1-Wasserstein距离，得到了尖锐的上下界限。
